name: ImpracticalClass
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours.

This platformer lets you swap angular momentum for vertical jump and altitude for mass as you try to escape from the strange world you find yourself in.

It also has some aspirations to teaching Geography, but due to the 48 hour time limit, this is more of a theme than an actual goal.

This game is playable with a controller.

PC Controls:

A and D move left and right.

Space bar to jump.

Ctrl to change mass (only on level 3).

The PostJam version fixes a flaw in the design of Level3 which could cause you to get stuck. If you're determined to play the original, jump and change mass right at the start of Level3. If you don't break through the floor on your first attempt, you will have to exit to the main menu and select level 3 and try again.
